sources.title: Roaring Roads (1935) RACE CAR ROMANCE
sources.description:
Stars: David Sharpe, Gertrude Messinger, Mary Kornman
Directors: Ray Nazarro, Charles E. Roberts

A young heir to millions has been overly restrained from normal youthful activities by his two old-maid Aunts. But when he meets a lovely girl, he decides to race her injured-brother's car in a big race!

sources.title: Roaring Roads (1935) Action, Crime, Romance Movie
sources.description:
Roaring Roads and Racy Romance! 
Young David Morton, heir to millions, has been over-zealously restrained from normal youthful activities by his two old-maid Aunts, Harriet and Agatha. In an outburst from his confinement, he meets lovely Gertrude, and promises to race her injured-brothers car in the Big Race. 

Directors: Ray Nazarro, Charles E. Roberts 
Writers: David Sharpe, Charles E. Roberts 
Stars: David Sharpe, Gertrude Messinger, Mary Kornman 
Genres: Action, Crime, Romance, Sport

metadata.Plot: Young David Morton, heir to millions, has been overzealously restrained from normal youthful activities by his two old-maid aunts, Harriet and Agatha. In a break from his confinement, he meets lovely Gertrude, and promises to race her injured brother's car in the Big Race. Between the gangsters trying to win the race by disabling him, and his bungling bodyguards trying to bring him home safely, David has a battle to win the race and Gertrude's heart. He succeeds in winning the race, capturing the gangsters, and getting his aunts to give him more freedom.
metadata.Actors: David Sharpe, Gertrude Messinger, Mary Kornman
